channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Grass extremely overgrown, obstructs view out of Dancey Road, obstructs view of the cycle path from Cheltenham Road East. Looks awful as people drive into the village. Spreading dandelion seeds to other areas, 12th August
item.description:
Grass area between Dancey Road and Cheltenham Road East
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dancey Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Willow tree is looking very precarious overhanging the road. It looks dangerous., 12th August
item.description:
By the traffic calming point nearest to Harp Hill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenway Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Badly damaged road surface, 12th August
item.description:
Badly damaged road surface in the middle of Prestbury Hugh Street towards the Noverton Lane end. Large area of road needing resurfacing in the centre of the road affecting both carriageways. I reported this last week, the job was closed off and I was advised the repairs had been completed. They haven't.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 12th August
item.description:
Customer states this area / section has been mowed and now the metal cover is sticking out of the frame. Please can this be made safe and identified.
Report on FixMyStreet
